availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Thomas Wilder (Decatur County, Indiana, millwright and soldier)

body.p: Decatur County, Indiana millwright and soldier. New York native. Married to Martha J. Wilder. Father of Mary Wilder and Rachel Wilder. Millwright in Decatur County, Indiana in 1860. Employed Kate Snell as a domestic worker in Decatur County, Indiana in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Decatur County, Washington, p. 701.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Hamilton County, Chattanooga Ward 2, p. 692A.
"Famous Soldier Well Known Here,"Princeton Daily Clarion(Princeton, Indiana), October 26, 1917, p. 2.
